traits.name: Amphibious
entries: Tecuziztecatl can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Glowing
entries: Tecuziztecatl sheds dim light within 20 feet of itself.

traits.name: Flexible
entries: Tecuziztecatl can enter a space large enough for a Medium creature without squeezing.

traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: Tecuziztecatl can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Pseudopod
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Spit Acid {@recharge 4}
entries: Tecuziztecatl exhales acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8 damage) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
